snippet: Timehop, like a diary, lets you “capture a moment in time” so you can look back on it later.
abstract: Timehop is a new service that sends subscribers a daily reminder of what they did a year ago by retracing their digital footsteps on several social media sites, offering a personalized time capsule of their recent past.
lead_paragraph: Timehop, like a diary, lets you “capture a moment in time” so you can look back on it later.

headline.seo: Timehop, a New Online Service, Tells You What You Were Doing a Year Ago
headline.main: My Back Pages: Digital Diary Traces Memories
headline.print_headline: My Back Pages: Digital Diary Traces Memories
